casebody.data:
Gregory Houston HOLT, aka Abdul Maalik Muhammad, petitioner,
v.
Ray HOBBS, Director, Arkansas Department of Correction, et al. No. 13-6827. Supreme Court of the United States March 3, 2014.

Case below, 509 Fed.Appx. 561.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States *1491Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit granted.
